sentences.sContent: The boy emptied out all his pockets onto the table.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boy emptied out all his pockets onto the table.
sentences.sCn: 这男孩把口袋里的东西都掏出来放在桌上。

sentences.sContent: When you add up the money at the bottom of the page, carry the total over onto the next page.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you add up the money at the bottom of the page, carry the total over onto the next page.
sentences.sCn: 你在这页的底端加上银钱的总数以后，要把这个总数转入下一页。

synos.tran: 在…之上；对…了解；映射到…上
